[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [img]https://imgur.com/1Wmirsv.png[/img] Adds a machine that keeps animals tame and trains them automatically.
[img]https://imgur.com/QXvd4a5.png[/img] This advanced Spacer machine can be built by completing the research for Ground Penetrating Scanner, Vitals Monitors, and Fabrication. The objective of the machine is to have a building that keeps your animals tame while your pawns do more important things. It should be noted that you can select a toggle that allows the machine to keep animals tame or to train animals up.
[img]https://imgur.com/nfOtKab.png[/img] The Auto tame toggle keeps all of your tamed animals within its radius tame for as long as the machine has power. this can free up a lot of your pawns time if you have lots of animals and need to waste hours on animal upkeep.
[img]https://imgur.com/fHjRLoa.png[/img] The Auto train toggle selects a random animal to train up, it can pick an available slot the animal can be trained in. It should be noted the machine only trains one animal at a time.
[img]https://imgur.com/jRpzgbS.png[/img] Mod was created- well actually none of the partys are private so...
